title: (Weds Early Bird) Adam Sandler on His new Netflix Movie and Getting Filmed in Public + Morgan Reviews ‘The Goonies’ + The Top 10 Richest Country Artists
itunes:title: (Weds Early Bird) Adam Sandler on His new Netflix Movie and Getting Filmed in Public + Morgan Reviews ‘The Goonies’ + The Top 10 Richest Country Artists
description:
Bobby talks to Adam Sandler about his new Netflix movie, getting filmed out in public and if he feels he recently got snubbed for an Oscar nomination. Morgan watched The Goonies for the first time and let us know if it holds up. Bobby shares a new list of the Top 10 richest country artists.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
